### Libraries

```{r}
#| message: false

library("tidyverse")
library("here")
library("broom")
library("patchwork")
```

### PCA

```{r}
analysis_data <- read_tsv(here("data", "03_expression_dat_aug.tsv.gz"))
```

```{r}
pca <- analysis_data |> 
  select(starts_with("ILMN_")) |> 
  scale() |> 
  prcomp()
```

#### Variance explained by principal components

```{r}
pca_var <- pca |> 
  tidy("eigenvalues")

p1 <- pca_var |> 
  ggplot(aes(PC, percent)) +
  geom_col()
  
p2 <- pca_var |> 
  ggplot(aes(PC, cumulative)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point()

p1 + p2
```

#### Data in principal component coordinates

```{r}
pca |> 
  augment(analysis_data) |> 
  ggplot(aes(.fittedPC1, .fittedPC2, color = BMI)) +
  geom_point()
```
